availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John N. Maxwell (Kenton County, Kentucky, grocery store owner)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, grocery store owner. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Maxwell. Father of George Maxwell and Thomas Maxwell. Married to Elizabeth Kessiah Maxwell. Father of Charles Maxwell, Laura Maxwell, Woodford Maxwell, and Mary Maxwell. Watchman in Kenton County in 1850. Grocery store owner in Kenton County in 1860. Juror in the case of William Nichol in Kenton County in September 1861.

ab.bibl:
